channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meet the millionaires living the ‘underconsumption’ life: They drive secondhand cars, batch cook, and never buy new clothes
item.description: From thrifted clothes to no gifts at the holidays, these millionaires are living an 'underconsumption' life which has opened up financial freedom.

item.title: Gen Z founder on ‘AI anxiety’ and being pigeonholed as generation shortcut: that’s the ‘biggest misconception’
item.description: "We don't really know what to do but we know it's coming and nobody is moving as fast to solve the problem," said Kiara Nirghin. AI or climate anxiety...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg gifted noise-canceling headphones to his Palo Alto neighbors because of the nonstop construction around his 11 homes
item.description: This isn’t the first time Zuckerberg has clashed with neighbors over real estate projects.

item.title: Christmas 500 years ago was a drunken 6-week feast that may have been considerably better than the modern holiday, medieval historian says
item.description: Though Christmas officially celebrates the birth of Jesus, it was clearly associated with pre-Christian celebrations that emphasized the winter solsti...

item.title: Amazon’s Alexa chief predicts an end to doom scrolling: the next generation is ‘going to just think differently’
item.description: "You've got to make sure you have products in their pockets, on their bodies, in their homes that they don't expect," Panos Panay said at Brainstorm A...

item.title: Michael Bublé is coming for Mariah Carey’s Christmas-music crown
S&P 500 closes at fresh record high in holiday-shortened session
With 20 minutes left to trade, the S&P 500 looks to close at an all-time high
S&P 500 hits record high on Christmas Eve for first time in more than a decade
Move over Mariah: How Michael Bublé is becoming the king of Christmas music
